sentences.sContent: He dipped in his raincoat pocket.
sentences.sCn: 他把手深深地伸进雨衣口袋里。

sentences.sContent: The dark clouds remembered me to take my raincoat along.
sentences.sContent_eng: The dark clouds remembered me to take my raincoat along.

sentences.sContent: If I had taken my raincoat with me this morning, I would not be wet now.
sentences.sContent_eng: If I had taken my raincoat with me this morning, I would not be wet now.
sentences.sCn: (从句指过去,主句指现在)。如果我今天早上带了雨衣，现在就不会被淋湿了。

trans.tranOther: a coat that you wear to protect yourself from rain
